column2: Latest;Preah------ Sihanouk provincial police chief said that at 3:00 am on June 23
column4: a total of 41 victims had been recovered from the collapsed hotel in Sankat 4.------17 people
column5: including 4 women are now known to have died
column6: with 24 injured (2 women).------Rescue work continues into the second morning following the disaster. ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/454041
